tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE digital_art_competitions ( 
   competition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
   competition_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
   submission_deadline TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
   judging_criteria TEXT[], 
   winner_id UUID 
);

CREATE TABLE submissions (
    submission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id UUID,
    artwork_title TEXT,
    artwork_description TEXT,
    submission_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE submissions (
    submission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    submission_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE judging_criteria (
    criteria_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    criteria_name VARCHAR(255),
    criteria_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE winners (
    winner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    submission_id INT,
    prize VARCHAR(100),
    winning_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (submission_id) REFERENCES submissions(submission_id)
)

CREATE TABLE judges (
    judge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    judge_name VARCHAR(255),
    speciality VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE submissions_judges (
    submission_id INT,
    judge_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (submission_id, judge_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (submission_id) REFERENCES submissions(submission_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (judge_id) REFERENCES judges(judge_id)
);
